Content: Accra Academy has 8 Halls of Residence: 1. Alema Hall 2. Awuletey Hall 3. Ellen Hall 4. Halm Addo Hall 5. Nana Akuako Sarpong Hall 6. Rt. Hon. Peter Ala Adjetey Hall (Nana Otoafom Bekoe) 7. Nana Wereko Ampem II Hall 8. Nana Awuah Darko Ampem Hall.
Named after S.N. Awuletey, a founding father.
A modern hall named after the prominent alumnus and traditional ruler.
One of the newer residential halls on campus.

Topic: Content: `The school has residential halls named after founders and prominent figures:

Category: the first building of the school in James Town)

Topic: 4. Wilson Tei Hall (also known as Willie 'T'Hall)
6. Nana Wereko Ampem II Hall(Named after the distinguished alumnus and traditional ruler)

Content: Named after the Rt. Hon. Peter Ala Adjetey(Speaker of Parliament and distinguished Bleoobi)
